name: Limb Display
script:
--limbshow
function ak.limbshow()
   cecho("aff_display","
<blue>****************
")
   cecho("aff_display","
Limbs:                
")
   ak.limbs = ak.limbs or {}
   ak.limbs.limbcount = ak.limbs.limbcount or {}
   if ak.limbs.limbcount[target] ~= nil then
      cecho("aff_display","

H+T  :<yellow>"..ak.limbs.limbcount[target].head.." "..ak.limbs.limbcount[target].torso.."      
")
      cecho("aff_display","

Arms: <yellow>"..ak.limbs.limbcount[target].leftarm.." "..ak.limbs.limbcount[target].rightarm.."      
")
      cecho("aff_display","

Legs: <yellow>"..ak.limbs.limbcount[target].leftleg.." "..ak.limbs.limbcount[target].rightleg.."      ")
   end
end
